title: Fed Policy, Border Wall & Trade
itunes:title: Fed Policy, Border Wall & Trade
description:
Kevin discusses the Fed's dovish remarks, US/China high stakes trade talks and the latest on border security negotiations. 

Guests:

Raj Shah, Former WH Deputy Press Secretary & Informal Advisor to Trump 2020 Reelection Campaign, Richard Fowler, Fox News Contributor, Sarah McGregor, Bloomberg News Economic Policy Editor

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
